scripts.prebuild: npm run build:js && npm run build:icons && npm run build:components
scripts.build:icons: cd ./node_modules/@status-im/icons && pnpm install --force --ignore-scripts && cd packages/icons && pnpm run build
scripts.build:components: cd ./node_modules/@status-im/components && pnpm install --force --ignore-scripts && cd packages/icons && pnpm run build && cd ../components && pnpm run build
scripts.build:js: cd ./node_modules/@status-im/js && pnpm install --force --ignore-scripts && cd packages/status-js &&  pnpm run build
